sentences.sContent: I still can’t fathom out what she meant.
sentences.sCn: 我还是弄不清她的意思。

synos.tran: 看穿；彻底了解；测量…的深度

words.tran: 看得透的；可测明深度的；可了解的

trans.tranCn: 看穿；彻底了解；测量…的深度
trans.tranOther: to understand what something means after thinking about it carefully

trans.tranCn: 英寻（测量水深的长度单位）
trans.tranOther: a unit for measuring the depth of water, equal to six feet or about 1.8 metres
